summary: Pretty ENB settings with balanced performance.
descriptionHtml:
This is a reupload of my ENB Settings, sorry for deleting it previously.

I want to present you my beautiful (in my opinion) and performance ENB which I created. Honestly when I made a configuration I didn\'t think about uploading it but then I said to myself \'Why not?\', and voil√†! in addition it will not lower your framerate to ridiculous count.

I HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO INSTALL [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13531]ULTRA REALISTIC WORLD LIGHTING[/url] to get the same result as you can see in a screenshots section (download \'Normal Nights version)!
It\'s also compatibile with Climates of Tamriel!

Installation:

1, Unpack the archive and put all files inside to main Skyrim directory (by default: Program Files/Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim).
2, Download [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0102.htm] ENB Series v0.102 Tatsudoshi[/url] and put d3d9.dll file to main Skyrim directory
3. Run Skyrim Launcher and then your graphics settings will be changed to maximum quality (you can change them whenever you want of course)
4. Play!

If you enjoy my ENB Settings - please Endorse it and write what you think about it in a comments section! Thank you :).


In a previous version many people said that nights are too dark, now I changed it and nights are similar to vanilla one.
author: Kingpin
